casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. CRAIG PONDER (14720)

Heiman, Schaller and Spear, Js.

Argued November 28 decision released December 19, 1995 *935Robert C. McCoy, for the appellant (defendant). Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Kevin T. Kane, state’s attorney, and Stephen Carney, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
